description: A famous guitarist, a demon hunter, and a lingerie thief called "Lingerier of Hamelin (ハーメルンの下着男, Haamerun no Shitagi Otoko)". He is Rhodonite`s handler and Christina`s contractor. He tried to set his Burial Doll free by Splitter. Splitter needed huge power and luck-eater`s probability control ability to work. So he assaulted demons to collect their power and stole undergarments, including Shuri`s and Kanade`s, to supply Christina with people`s luck.(In anime, he didn`t steal undergarments.)
name: Kagakagari Takaya
